roleset.name: develop specific antibodies as a result of infection or immunization

example.name: seroconvert-v
example.text: while [one tantalus monkey]-1 required one year *PRO*-1 to seroconvert and the other never fully seroconverted.

example.name: seroconversion-n
example.text: In the present article, we present seroconversion of hepatitis B virus surface antigen (HBsAg) by entecavir administrated in a young child with chronic hepatitis ...
example.arg: of hepatitis B virus surface antigen (HBsAg)
administrated in a young child with chronic hepatitis
